patthana1.10:359.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā
patthana1.10:359.1_1: dassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.10:360.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā
patthana1.10:360.1_1: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa
patthana1.10:360.1_2: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.10:361.1_0: (Idhāpi sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ atthi. Ye te pañhā na likhitā, te pāḷiyaṁ gaṇentānaṁ
patthana1.10:361.1_1: byañjanena na samenti. Te pāḷiyaṁ na likhitā gaṇanā pākaṭā honti. Yadi saṁsayo uppajjati,
patthana1.10:362.1_0: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe
patthana1.10:362.1_1: nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre
patthana1.10:362.1_2: naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate
patthana1.10:364.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekādasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare ekādasa, naaññamaññe
patthana1.10:364.1_1: tīṇi, naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye
patthana1.10:364.1_2: najhāne namagge ekādasa, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā ekādasa,
patthana1.10:366.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare
patthana1.10:366.1_1: sattarasa, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe ekādasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa,
patthana1.10:366.1_2: purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre
patthana1.10:366.1_3: satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte nava,
patthana1.10:366.1_4: atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
